summary: Turns you into a god amongst thieves.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first upload, I hope to actually add this to an item once the creation kit comes out, as my first mod.

It deactivates AI detection while you\'re sneaking, meaning, while you\'re sneaking, NPCs and Enemies will NOT see you. Ever. Even if you\'re right in 

front of them in broad daylight.

It also sets your pickpocket probability to 100% all the time. your pickpocket attempts will always be successful.

It doesn\'t alter your stats or perks in any way, so if you want to play without it, you can simply reload the game and continue without issue. You can grind your stealth and pickpocket skills this way.

Instructions are in the readme.
author: H3xx
